msg: Remember to recycle the request & response, even when there is an error.

author: billbarker
msg: Clean up the handling of remoteAddr and remoteHost.
We share both of these with the coyoteRequest, so there is no reason to duplicate.

author: mturk
msg: There is no need to set the socket to the blocking mode, cause it
is already created as such by default.

msg: FIONBIO doesn't get set unless BSD_COMP is defined on Solaris 8.
